name: Twilio Hackpack for Python
description: The fastest way to start using Twilio with Python.  Based on Flask microwebframework.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio account's unique identifier, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio account's secret key, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWILIO_CALLER_ID.description: A Twilio number assigned to your account in E.164 format, found here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account/phone-numbers/incoming
